data.title: Time difference between Ghana and Spain
data.meta_description: Information about time zones and time difference between countries Ghana and Spain. The time shown here apply Daylight Saving Time when required.
data.text:
Spain has multiple time zones, that reason we now list some of the most important places with their respective local times.

Traveling from Accra to Madrid

By car, it would take you approximately 48.66 hours to get to Madrid, Spain driving non-stop from Accra, Ghana at a constant speed of 80 kilometers per hour.

By plane, it would take you approximately 6.49 hours to get to Madrid, Spain taking a direct flight from Accra, Ghana.
